v1.18.0.description: removes unnecessary height restriction on c-select class
fixes select to fallback to values when ids are missing

v1.16.0.description: fixes border being added by default; border will only be added when f-border class is present alongside c-select class

v1.14.0.description: adds f-border to generated select-menu and also adds support for f-flex

v1.10.0.description: adds disabled state and required flag

v1.8.0.description: progressively enhance select to use select menu when js is available
